SEARCH
Package com.dhk.models

Class Slot

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.models.Slot
public class Slot extends Object
This class represents the model for a Slot. The display mode, display scale, and hot key for a slot are initialized here.
Version:
1.2.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024
